Name: Veil of Serenity
Story Background: As the darkness encroached, the mage called upon the calming whispers of the veil, which shielded allies from the storms of conflict.
Ability: Exile target enchantment or creature spell.
Appearance Description: The card features a serene, ethereal veil enveloping a creature and dispelling a glowing enchantment. The overall tone is tranquil and light, with soft shades of white and blue blending seamlessly to create a sense of serene protection.
